items.description: [BATTLE] Finish Gauntlet Mode with any character.
[BATTLE] Win 5 successive victories in Survival Mode.
[BATTLE] Extend the timer by at least 150 seconds in Time Trial Mode.
Defeat 10 opponents using a Special Move.
Defeat an opponent for the first time using a Weapon Flipping Technique.
Defeat 10 opponents with Weapon Flipping Techniques.
Defeat an opponent for the first time using a Super Special Move.
Defeat 10 opponents with Super Special Moves.
Defeat an opponent for the first time using Lightning Blade.
Defeat 10 opponents with Lightning Blade strikes.
Successfully use a Counter for the first time.
Successfully use Just Defense for the first time.
Knock down an opponent with a Stance Break 10 times.
Defeat an opponent while unarmed for an entire battle.
Defeat an opponent by only kicking for an entire battle.
Win a round within 10 seconds of the start of battle.
Complete a Flashpoint on Earth, Titan, Nessus, or Io.
Collect 15 Red War exotic weapons or armor.
Complete the Leviathan raid on Prestige difficulty.
Encounter an Agent of the Nine somewhere in the system.
Collect 10 Forsaken Exotic weapons or armor.
Pursue Uldren and the Fanatic to the Watchtower, and finish what you started.
Find all documents, relics and GPS caches.
Purchase all skills in one category.
Purchase all skills in all categories.
Fully mod and completely upgrade any weapon.
Fully mod and completely upgrade all weapons.
Kill and loot 10 large animals (deer, boar, wolves).
Kill and loot 10 small animals (rabbits, chickens, rats).
Kill and loot 10 flying animals (crows and gulls).
Perform 50 headshot kills in the single player campaign.
Force an enemy to drop dynamite that kills two people when exploding.
Complete a match in all multiplayer modes.
Kill 20 enemy players in multiplayer using a turret.
Kill a zip-lining enemy player in multiplayer.
Catch a player in a snare trap in multiplayer.
Revive a teammate in a multiplayer match.
Win a ranked match in every multiplayer mode.
In multiplayer, be the only player on your team that isn't dead or downed.
Kill 10 multiplayer enemies using your melee attack.
Kill 2 multiplayer enemies with a single explosive.
In multiplayer, escape death 3 times by using the rope ascender.
Buy every upgrade and character in multiplayer.
Recruit and assign a Legendary NPC for your ship.
Acquire and equip your first Legendary item.
Equip 1 Legendary melee weapon and 5 Legendary armor pieces.
Upgrade the Adrestia to Legendary Status.
Fully crew the Adrestia with Legendary Lieutenants.
Defeat a Mercenary in the Arena.
Upgrade the Adrestia for the first time.
Spend the night with another character.
Perform an Overpower Attack with every weapon type.
Kill the Leader of any Region with Low Resources, other than Megaris.
Complete 20 Bounties, War Contracts, or Naval Quests from Message Boards.
Complete 20 Quests on Pephka, Obsidian and Abantis islands.
Raise your Bounty to the maximum level.
Win your first on land conquest battle in any region (excluding Megaris in "Hero's Journey)."
Engrave a Legendary Item with a Legendary Effect.
Complete The Show Must Go On.
Complete A Friend Worth Dying For
Complete One Really, Really Bad Day
Complete Every Story Has an Ending
Kill 10 enemies using the Death Veil ability.
Land a Rush Assassinate that chains 4 times with the Pride of the Lion.
Kill all of the Ancients in the Order of the Hunters in Makedonia.
Kill 10 enemies using the Rapid Fire ability.
Heal by parrying 10 times with the Judgment of the Lion.
Kill all of the Ancients in the Order of the Storm in Achaia.
Kill 10 enemies using the Fury of the Bloodline Ability.
Heal by getting 10 headshot kills while you have the Golden Harbinger "equipped."
Kill all the Ancients in the Order of Dominion in Messenia
Destroy all of the Marble Maiden Tributes.
Collect all the Keeper's Insights in Episode 1.
Win the conquest of Elysium with freed humans from the 3 main regions.
Collect all the Keeper's Insights in Episode 2.
Kill 10 Isu Soldiers with the Blessing of Kronos enhancement.
Collect all the Keeper's Insights in Episode 3.
Improved fishing level for the first time.
Improved survival level for the first time.
Improved photography level for the first time.
Improved cooking level for the first time.
Initiated first link-strike after parrying an attack.
Called forth the Armiger for the first time.
Crafted a spell for the first time.
Used magic for the first time.
Summoned one of the Six for the first time.
Played JUSTICE MONSTERS FIVE for the first time.
Caught an image of Gentiana in a photo.
Scored 500,000 or more points in Score Attack.
Scored 1,000,000 or more points in Score Attack.
Took 10 photos mid-battle using Selfie Shot.
Earned the top ranking on all three Time Trial courses.
Powered up all facilities in Lestallum.
Crafted a weapon of Level 30 or higher.
Met the owner of the Crow's Nest Diner.
Witnessed the awakening of King Noctis.
Took down 10 enemies using the spelldaggers.
Took down 100 enemies using Total Clarity.
Earned the top ranking in the Friendly Match.
Posted excellent times in all cross-country test drives.
Awakened to the True Power of Kings.
Completed the Comrades quest with all four characters.
